data.text: @AnilvanderZee He nee wat stom! En akelig ook. Je bent er gelukkig nog 🙏🏽❤️
@AnilvanderZee Wat is dat voor blad ze zeggen onderzoek naar het chronisch vermoeidheidssyndroom te doen? Zijn ze toch echt niet goed op de hoogte lijkt het. Blij dat het niet zo is 🤔
@AnilvanderZee I saw your name on that list and was surprised and relieved to see rumors of your death were greatly exaggerated
@AnilvanderZee I’m so sorry you died. Can’t decided if still having access to Twitter after death is good or bad. Twitter might need to redraft it’s rules on lifetime bans to eternal bans.

@AnilvanderZee Slordig... héél slordig!
En gelukkig niet waar💪🏻

@AnilvanderZee And it's not like your account was inactive during that time! From July 26, 2020

https://t.co/2HAUqGGpE4
@AnilvanderZee It'll also need an epilogue about how you rose from the grave. Probably something to do with CBT 🤷‍♀️

@AnilvanderZee First of all, WOW, I am so sorry!

Secondly, it's pretty sloppy reporting. It says your death was announced on twitter and yet a quick search of your name would have found your twitter account.
